lyrics:
17 contributorsmy heart is open lyricsverse 1 adam levine
i know youre scared ooh i can feel it
its in the air i know you feel that too

ill walk away and i will leave you be
and thats the last time youll say no say no to me

ill do anything you want me to
cause i cant breathe until i see your face

i cant spend another minute getting over loving you
